page.title: 13Myself in ten years (cont)
page.content: I think that a lot of things will have changed in ten years time. People won't use money very much, they willl use credit cards mainly. Fashions will be very different as well. I hope we will have a car then we could use it to take our children to different places. We could also drive to see my parents and stay with them for a day. I would give my children pocket money but they would have to save some of it in the bank. They could use the money for their holidays or when they wanted to buy something expensive. I will be nineteen years old in ten years time.
